items.name: Rick and Morty T-Shirts
items.description: A wide variety of T-shirts featuring iconic characters, catchphrases, and designs from the show.

items.name: Rick's Lab Coat
items.description: A white lab coat similar to what Rick Sanchez wears in the series.

items.name: Meeseeks Costume
items.description: A costume that allows you to transform into a Mr. Meeseeks, complete with the blue skin and boxy head.

items.name: Pickle Rick Costume
items.description: A costume that lets you become Pickle Rick, one of the show's most famous episodes.

items.name: Interdimensional Cable Hoodie
items.description: A hoodie featuring designs from the Interdimensional Cable episodes.

items.name: Rick and Morty Pajamas
items.description: Comfortable pajama sets with show-themed prints.

items.name: Morty's Portal Gun Leggings
items.description: Leggings with a pattern of Morty's portal gun.

items.name: Birdperson Hoodie
items.description: A hoodie featuring the character Birdperson and his distinct look.
